alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 3:52PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade and south central Broward Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 352 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Intersection Krome And U.S. 27, or 8 miles west of Miramar, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Davie, Weston and Intersection Krome And U.S. 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
